title: Introducing: M E T R Y K
content:
This is stunning.

Berlin trio M E T R Y K comprised of Hanna, Falk and Arne have just released their debut, three track EP, composed of nine minutes of otherworldly electronic-pop. From Hanna’s untouchable vocals, to the beautiful, swirling compositions that cascade around her, there’s something magical to their EP, Calming Waves. It’s a sound that’s been done before, but rarely done so well. Check out the full release below, you won’t regret it.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
